entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
